Summary: Two bright lights crossing sky, one behind the other, in straight line
divs: sighting detailswas sitting on the back patio of my house the night of sat, april 26, 2008 talking with friends. saw two really bright white lights cross the sky from south east to north west. the lights were quite bright, brighter than any star or airplane lights and they traveled in a straight line one behind the other, separated by not too far, but further than if they were one thing. they were bright enough, that i did not see them straight on at first, i actually saw the light reflecting if you will off the side of the house\windows on the second story, which made me look back and up at the sky. there was no noise, they were low enough to be under the cloud cover that night, and they moved really fast, (saw them for maybe 4 seconds before they were here and gone). there was no light trail behind the lights, and they all the sudden went out as opposed to disappearing on the horizon.
trends: There have been 25 other sightings in Plano
There were no other sightings in Plano on or around April 26th 2008
